title: WSI
name: Wireless Site Indicator
definition: Identifies that the termination is at a wireless site.
fieldNotes: CKR is used by the customer as a cross reference to the provider circuit ID ( s )  and in many cases to identify the customer's end-to-end service.
validEntryNotes:
A valid entry of "New" indicates that this is the customer's initial order to this wireless site. 
A valid entry of "Existing" indicates that the customer has previously ordered to this wireless site.
usageNotes: Required when the ACT field is "N" and the first position of the REQTYP is "S" or "E" and the SECLOC field on the Transport or EUSA Form is  a wireless site, otherwise prohibited.
